title: Sage 50 Pro Accounting 2023 U.S. with Payroll 1-Year Subscription Small Business Accounting Software
description: Sage 50 Pro Accounting is an easy-to-use desktop subscription accounting software. Track financials, pay bills, process payroll for 1-10 employees, and invoice customers. Formerly Peachtree Accounting, we have supported small businesses for 41 years.
